entry.title: 3M AB80651 - 3M Flap Wheel 747D, Type 83, 3 in x 1 in x 1/4 in 80 X-weight, 10 per case AB80651 7100138162
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 12.48

[shortdesc]

3M Flap Wheel 747D, Type 83, 3 in x 1 in x 1/4 in 80 X-weight, 10 per case

  • The 3M™ Flap Wheel 747D was designed for light grinding, blending, deburring, and polishing on a variety of metals
  • Ceramic abrasive-covered flaps conform to the work piece and provide a smooth, clean finish.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Ceramic aluminum oxide blend offers excellent cut rate and life for better performance
  • X-weight cotton backing withstands aggressive sanding and grinding
  • Resin bonding resists thermal and chemical deterioration for extended wheel life
  • Abrasive flap design provides a soft and smooth cut on rounded or irregular surfaces
  • Includes a grind-aid to provide cooler running on stainless-steel and other metals
    		•
